title: looking for roommate(for pg) - girls
content: Hello there! im exploring pgs and appartments around here for year 2. if you need a roommate, dm. Let's explore together

comments.body:
let's explore together? what is this? a roommate hint or a bad dating show? IF YOU CAN'T EVEN SPELL ‘APARTMENTS’ RIGHT, I’M SURE YOU’LL ‘EXPLORE’ YOUR WAY INTO A LEASE SCAM IN NO TIME. 

good luck out there, dora the roommate explorer
